code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./Certifications.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const certificates=[{title:'AI/ML Specialization',issuer:'Lovely Professional University',file:'Gowni Kranthi Kumar.pdf',year:'2024'},{title:'IBM Data Science Certificate',issuer:'IBM',file:'Certificate IBM.pdf',year:'2023'},{title:'Machine Learning Internship',issuer:'Cipher Schools',file:'CipherSchools_GK.pdf',year:'2023'}];const Certifications=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"certifications",className:"certifications section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"section-header",initial:{opacity:0,y:30},whileInView:{opacity:1,y:0},viewport:{once:true},transition:{duration:0.6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Certifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"section-subtitle",children:"Recognized achievements in AI, Data Science, and Machine Learning"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"certificates-grid",children:certificates.map((cert,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"certificate-card",initial:{opacity:0,y:30},whileInView:{opacity:1,y:0},viewport:{once:true},transition:{duration:0.6,delay:idx*0.1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certificate-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:cert.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"issuer",children:cert.issuer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"year",children:cert.year})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/").concat(cert.file),target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn btn-primary view-certificate-btn",children:"View Certificate"})]},cert.title))})]})});};export default Certifications;
